title: Software Developer
intro:
Welcome to my portfolio! As a junior developer, I am passionate about creating innovative and user-friendly solutions. I am always looking to expand my skills and grow as a professional.
 
 On this website, you can find a selection of my recent projects and learn more about my experience and qualifications.
 
  Thank you for visiting. Feel free to contact me with any questions or opportunities. I am always open to discussing new projects and challenges.

achievements: Overseeing the creation of multiple software programs, including systems for investment management and cooperative management.
Crafting user guides for enterprise software
Implementing systems to enhance organizational structures, such as introducing Zoho CRM.
Evaluating software and serving as a liaison between developers and the organization.
Providing technical assistance to Company staff
Installing,configuring and updating hardware and software
Training staff on softwares like MS Office

Corpus Christi Senior High School, Accra Ghana
